name: Spaced Out (NinjaFishfish)
description:
Sit back, relax, and enjoy the view as you toss moons, planets, and suns into orbit. Then when you feel like you've had enough, shoot them all down! This was created for the 2022 VR Game Jam hosted by UCF's VR Knights. Enjoy!

Note, this works best with the Oculus Quest 2, and must be played with a VR.

Controls:

Grips - grab objects

Left Joystick - move

Right Joystick - pivot

Right trigger - fire projectile

Left trigger - reset world

A - Quit

Credits:

Ryan Fisher and Kellie Driscoll.
